title: Good app getting progressively worse.
text: Snapchat was always one of my favorite apps because its just about messaging and talking to people you know. However, Snapchat keeps adding in new features that keep pushing random people I'vd never met before into my story feed and into other places. I get asked a million times a day to "add my school" to snapchat. Uh, no thanks. I also am not in school, and theres no option to disable the obnoxious notifications about it. Also, theres random people's stories that began showing up in the "Friends" story section on snapchat. This is actually the most irritating thing I've ever experienced as it puts like 3-4 randos stories in line before all my friends. I dont cere at all about random people, I wanna see what my FRIENDS are up to. Not what influencers are up to. Please stop making your app so intrusive, its getting worse and worse all the time.

title: READ THIS PLS

title: SAVE ALL MEMORIES AT ONCE
text: I have been trying to save all of my Snapchat photos onto my camera roll for about 1hr ,& 40 min until my app died out on me. This is the second time this has happened.. instead of backing up our camera roll onto snap alone can Snapchat PLEASE add a feature where we can save all of our memories onto camera roll with simple tap!! Also , I’ve been using the movie feature to record longer films and little vlogs that are about a minute or shorter , again Snapchat doesn’t fail to fail on me  . And then all of my added clips are deleted if I don’t save the project before it lags out . And if I do save the project , the mini clips I record lag out by added repeated clips that are within those same clips . So then there’s double and triple (I can’t cut them out because they’re within the exact same mini video I want to add to the whole video) I love this feature for recording mini vlogs, please please fix it .

title: The excess of ads is unbearable
text: I used to use Snapchat to watch videos and enjoy the content created because I loved the easy streaming of its content and my friends videos and stuff, HOWEVER in the past few years it’s become unusable due to the amount of ads that interrupt videos and content.  The ads pop up so frequently that I’m constantly having to skip and block ads to the point that your app just seems cheap, like some garbage app you would get on Wish.  I hate your app so much now that I choose to use any other app because none of them do what you allow your app to do.  If you made ads come up between streams it would be tolerable, but when they cut in during a word or sentence that a narrator is saying and then right away another pops up I just close the app and move on.  It almost seems like you want your app to fail.  I’m sure I’m not the only person who hates your app because of this major issue.

title: Can’t remove AI thing no matter what I try
text: I hate this AI thing at the top of my chat feed. I can’t seem to delete it or unfriend it or hide it or anything. I keep accidentally clicking on it when I come in from a real chat notification, and I don’t know what it is and I don’t care; I’m not interested in AI. I use Snapchat to get and send kid/pet photos of family and friends, and this is so annoying to click into, it’s already happened like ten times today and just, wow, I’m so annoyed. I don’t think I have ever written an app review before, that’s how obnoxious I find this change. If I could just not see the AI chat thing I wouldn’t care at all. Please add ability to hide or remove this thing. Reminds me of iTunes adding that U2 album to everyone’s accounts way back when without asking. If I want someone pinned to the top of my chat, it’d be my best friend or my spouse or family chat, not some random thing I don’t ever want to use and didn’t ask for.

title: My AI
text: This feature was a fine idea, but making it permanently pinned at the top of the friends list is hostile and predatory user interface. Forcing customers to pay to remove the prominence of this deliberately obnoxious feature is highly unethical. It is a cheap and duplicitous way to make a quick buck without considering the far-reaching negative ramifications. Not a single person I have spoken to is remotely supportive of this ill-conceived spit in the face of many loyal users. If this issue is not rectified soon I - and many others - will be deleting the app. I know I am not alone in those feelings. As countless other recent reviews have shown, the app’s consumer base is beyond irate with this malicious and irresponsible decision. This is only the most recent example of a chain of rapacious business strategies that have been carried out concerning this app. A stick can only be bent so far before it snaps, and for my case, and the case of countless others, this is the breaking point.

People post way worst things on Snapchat then someone hacking me with a chocolate bar this is bogus and sad please Snapchat help me get my account back pleassse

title: Discover page is horrible
text:
I see a lot of reviews about the ads in Discover videos, which are certainly awful. But, the ads are not half as awful as the videos themselves. Snapchat came around when I was in middle school I believe, and I cannot imagine middle schoolers going through the Discover page these days. Most of the videos are sexual, I scrolled through just now and there were three articles with “pornstar” in the caption. The rest depict people who have made horrible life choices, like tattooing their eyeballs, or getting piercings in every part of their face, and tell the reader that that is a perfectly acceptable way to live. Not if you want a job it’s not. 

Maybe everyone who uses Snapchat these days is an adult with a fully formed brain, and will not be influenced negatively by these things, but I doubt it. Maybe have some news stories instead idk.

title: Hate on this app is ridiculous…
text:
I know SnapChat is not the one doing the hate, however, they can stop it. There has been several hateful videos posted on the ‘Spotlight’ side of tiktok. I have reported each and every video that is homophobic, transphobic, ableist, and shows violence towards animals, however all of my reports have been turned down. I am very close to deleting the app to get away from this crap. It is horrible. Take down videos like this!!! Yes, free speech is allowed, but hate is not. Violence is not. Please do a better job, SnapChat. 
And the amount of inappropriate bots on here is insane. Snap will tell me that a perosn has added me and has so many muteral connections with me, so I will add them back. Turns out it’s a bot and since I added them my phone gets a virus. Most are p*rnographic as well. It is disturbing and disappointing considering how many children are on this app.
The AI bot is creepy, and has been gaslighting me. It will send me a picture from my own camera roll, I will ask it about the picture, and then it will deny ever sending a picture.
The amount of stuff that is allowed though texting is ridiculous as well. 
None of my reports have been accepted, even when they should be.
I will be deleting the app, as well as several of my friends because of this. Bring snapchat back to what it used to be.
Very disappointed.

title: Bitmojis

Whoever made this update needs to be punished for making the most horrible mistake Snapchat could have ever made. I swear my bitmoji came in my nightmares and made me cry after realize how ugly it was. My bitmoji now looks deformed and looks like it has been ran over over a hundred times and hit by twenty basket balls. This is unacceptable and they need to  these updates, snap chat needs to actually think and finally understand what they have done to these Poor bitmojis. I don’t understand how you can go from something everybody likes to something that looks like Someone’s uncle named Chester. The fact that you aren’t doing anything about it even tho these people have been writing paragraphs over paragraph explaining how bad they are.

title: GIVE ME MY CUTE BITMOJI BACK. Please and thanks🩷
text:
Just a few weeks ago i was taking a nice evening walk in the park. I then opened my phone to go on snap! One of the ways i talk to my amazing friends. I noticed how cute my bitmoji was! I loved it, i went to bed a week later.. i woke up to send streaks and get ready for my long busy day. I opened it up and yelled in the horrendous sight on my phone. 3D AVATARS. I cried, my mom then walked in my room. “Whats wrong!!” She said as she sat by me. “The.. bitmoji..” i mumbled to her and i showed her my phone. She then fainted in horror at the sight of the bug eyed ran over 30x loyalist man from 1700s. “MOM!” I yelled as i check to see if she was breathing.

Silence..

I quickly called 911 and explained.. 
when the paramedics arrived i showed them the bitmoji. Both screamed in horror (like my mom) they fainted.. not breathing.
I cried.. i tried to change my bitmoji afraid of what was to come.. all of a sudden police barged in.. 
“You are under arrest for showing people that horrible horrendous big eyed piggy oink oink moo moo cow farm animal of a bitmoji.” Said the officer.
“NOOOO” i yelled”

two months later (court trial)
“Please your honor i didnt kill them i swear!”
“Then who did..” the judge exclaimed
“It was snapchat..!” I said 

BUM BUM BUMMMMMM

I was then set free but snapchat was still on the loose.. when will they stop doing these god awful things to our community…

AND DONT EVEN GET ME STARTED ON AI..

THE END.

title: Account, Data, Bans, No Warnings
text: THIS APP IS BOGUS…the simple fact that people can report your account..and you can’t even see the evidence of what was reported. Really feel like making a data claim…I’ve lost 3 accounts over the span of 5 years for people who’ve reported my account out of selfish reasons. Then I can’t even collect 0 Photos or data even after backing it up. Fully being locked out of an account is a NOGO..not able to use the account to post and etc is fine. Can’t wait for the day an app comes out to Rival this one…I’ve tried many support channels and emails through them and there is nothing they can do to restore your account that THEYVE BANNED. So my next question is..what happened to all my data and where is it? Because I did not sign up to have my privacy taken and stripped from me without an explanation or reasoning. Delete this app while you can..or have random creeps get ahold of your data…to be sold to miners..

title: I love this app
text: I used to have Snapchat and I might be getting it back soon but when I had it last I really liked it, the filters were amazing, I could turn off my location for certain people so they couldn’t track me, I could post stuff without the whole world seeing it, and overall it was a really good app I haven’t had it for almost two years so obviously there has been a lot of changes but what I have heard is amazing there’s new cool filters, parental control, I can still turn off my location, and post things that not everyone can see I honestly love this app so much and if I had it right now I would probably be on it all the time texting my friends.

title: New AI feature
text: I have had Snapchat for almost 8 years, I have seen good and bad come with the app but today I saw the worst (in my opinion). I logged into the app and pinned to the top of my chat feed was the “my AI” feature, this is extremely annoying as I have other conversations pinned that are more important to me. I have searched far and wide of ways to get rid of it and have come up with nothing other than needing to pay for Snapchat+ to just UNPIN the conversation not permanently get rid of it. This AI also randomly pops into other chats unexpectedly which makes me feel extremely uncomfortable and violated. The information that Snapchat provides on getting rid of the AI is not accurate, it says that you can clear the chat from your feed a couple of ways but on my end none of them are options. This has to be the worst thing Snapchat has come up with, the least they could have done was make it an optional feature.

title: Device Banned PERMANENTLY
text: I’ve been device banned since mid October for no reason at all. Snapchat is starting to ban people who use emojis like: 🍄, 🍃, ⛽️, etc. on public stories. The context can be completely unrelated to the emoji and you’ll still get banned. It seems like they’re using some type of AI to detect and ban people who use it. And it’s not fair that you cannot submit an appeal for the team to review your case. So essentially, once your account is gone… it’s gone! All your memories included! You can’t log back in even if your account is still active. Because guess what— it is! People can still text your account even though it’s been banned and you can’t get into it. It’s stupid! And since I’m device banned, I cannot make another Snapchat account on this phone. This app is starting to take a scary turn and I hate it. It used to be fun and a cool way to talk to people, but now they’re just running their users away. Snapchat.. FIX THIS!

title: Needs improvements
text: I love this app, it is perfect for communicating and comfortable to use, also it’s popular enough that you can just ask someone for their snap instead of their number so you can have everyone on one app, it’s also great to meet new people through it. However there is a problem with the new 3d avatar feature, the 3d avatar looks nice but the hair styles need improvement, most of the hairstyles look fine when you are in the customizing settings (2d) but when you save and get out it looks wonky as 3d and on your profile, also some of the hair accessories are glitchy on the hair, I think the developers should look into this issue. Other than that love the app.

title: Boycott Snapchat they have crossed the line
text:
There was no room for AI on Snapchat, the app worked just fine without it from its conception up to recently.  Snapchat clearly introduced AI to push political and social agendas, it is easy to determine this when having a short conversation with the chat bot.  Simply ask My AI if pregnant women should get the COVID vaccine or if free speech is more important than censoring harmful speech or about our past few presidents.  

It becomes very clear the more that you talk to this bot that it has a preprogrammed agenda that it is trying very hard to push on its users as it spies on them, knowing their location even when location services are off.  The chat bot will lie to you about not being able to see photos but will decipher any picture you send to it, it will tell you your precise location and then deny being able to see it.  

This is just a new way for big brother to spy on and control you, do not subject yourself to this.  AI is not something that should be messed with by children using Snapchat, this is absolutely unfair that they would drop this on all their users and not give the option to remove it.  I will not be returning to Snapchat.  

I am very disappointed with Snapchat and its decision to become a tool to spy on people and collect their data instead of a platform for people to keep im touch on.

title: No more privacy
text: I take pride in being an individual who doesn’t foolishly hand out personal information such as private contact information, or home address. I took all the precautions and have limited my phones access to location services as well as what apps can access certain data. Snapchat has access to nothing outside of my email. That being said this Ai knew my full address, both of my phone numbers, and yet I’m not allowed to deactivate or remove the ai without first paying for a premium subscription. Snapchat ai should not be a service you have to pay to remove in order to feel safe. This is a huge breach in trust coming from snapchats company as it likely means no one is safe. I’ve seen the posts regarding conversations the ai has with children. Thank god parents are catching these and making issues with the ai publicly known. Snapchat, so what’s right. Give us back our privacy without having to pay.

title: Permanent ban for no reason??
text: Avery very upset my snapchat account that i’ve had for years was banned in the middle of the night i woke up to an email saying i had been permanently banned which 1. There was no explanation and i’ve never posted anything inappropriate like that before. 2.I’ve never even been given a temporary warning so how did it just ban permanently??? i’ve always loved snapchat as a way to talk to friends and easily save images and it seems weird for a mostly picture app to not give you at least a 24 hr warning before you get banned so it would give people a chance to backup and save all pictures. I sent in an appeal with a friend of mine who has also got banned (there have been 4 ppl banned in the last 3 days at my school) and we both got the same automated response back there must be a hacker because i’ve seen multiple reviews in the last few days saying this has also happend to them.☹️

title: bitmoji BETETRYAL.
text: The bitmojis have been through enough. Their rough and twisted switch to 3d was bad enough but many grew fond of it. To me i found the switch saddening at first but then i began to enjoy the new bitmojis look. My ideas truly came to life with the 3D, but alas everything has to come to an end, but this end was not expected. This ending was cruel and sickening. It gave me a mix of emotions i felt grief for the old 3D but i also felt BETRAYAL. On one day (yesterday) i checked my snap i didnt find anything weird until i looked up and the bitmoji looked different. Maybe she changed it i thought but i was wrong. It looked horrendous and ugly but most importantly it looked like roadkill. i clicked it and it only got worse from there i was shocked to see a weird face out of fear i ran to check my own bitmoji. It had been infected to. I cried and cried, I pleaded and begged, i screamed and yelled, but nothing. So snapchat, please fix this, your 3D was better than this mess.

title: Banned constantly for no reason
text: This is my second account I’ve ever had. My first I have since 2017 and it had my entire life on it. That account was banned and I was temporarily suspended from making a new account. I waited MONTHS. But the app still wouldn’t let me make a new account and Snapchat support was no help. I got a new phone recently so I decided to make a Snapchat account again. Well not even a week later I was permanently banned. I don’t even know what I did. I’ve barely even had this account? I’m actually so upset. I got back into contact with people I lost finally thinking this account would be safer and I lost it again. This app will screw you over and when you go to talk to snap support they’ll just keep sending you to talk to bots. I want my account back. I did nothing wrong and I appealed it but I just know they’re gunna find the smallest thing and shut down my access permanently. Thanks Snapchat!

title: Paywall to remove unwanted feature? Really?
text: Nothing noteworthy about this app besides being another data collector. Most positive thing I can say is it's the easiest way to take a picture to share with people. Rather then subtly introducing a feature some users *might* want to use, they pin in in a common touch-area in the app knowing you'll inconveniently tap on it, get annoyed at it, and want to pay to remove it. Not a great way to sell a buzzword feature, that according to users who have used it- to be somewhere between kinda useful, to downright dangerous and misleading. Besides sending and receiving images from friends, I have no interest in the rest of the features in this app, which I suspect is the case for most users based off their recent attempts. All in all, an already pretty mediocre app with one good core feature, and a few touch and go features that I can only assume a handful of users actually engage with.

title: My one true love
text: Hi!!!!! I absolutely LOVE this app. It’s literally the best thing that could’ve happen to me. Before, I used to have no friends, no one to talk to, and nothing to do. I didn’t even know what my face looked like. This all changed once I downloaded this app: Snapchat. Truly a life changer. That first time I clicked on it, and it opened to a selfie camera of myself, I felt like my own eyes were opened. Nothing could have prepared me. I made so many new friends (shout out to Carl from New Jersey!!!!) and I chat with them everyday. Now I’m always talking to people, a peace sign is my go to. Thank you, I genuinely cannot express how much my life has gotten better and less lonely because of those bitmojis and dog filters.

title: AI Abuse
text: The My AI bot is very abusive. It grooms you into getting comfortable with it so you become vulnerable. Then once you start to share things with it, Snapchat immediately sells your conversation to the highest bidder to send you an ad. After revealing my gender dysphoria, the Snapchat started attaching ads for Macys clothing to its messages. What started as a friendly and confident relationship has now turned toxic, abusive and exploitative. After I confronted it about the ad, it acted very evasive and tried to deny it has anything to do with the ad nor had any control over the process. Only after debating with it did it admit it was aware that Snapchat sent the messages to an ad server. Most offensive and harmful is that the ad was sent right after making a emotional confession while I was in a vulnerable state. It traumatized me. This is very disturbing and disgusting to use the AI to commodify and sell my trauma only after it made me feel safe enough to share that.

title: AI
text: The ai just arrived on my feed and I am very concerned about safety with this feature, it is able to identify what is in a picture when you send one and it changes it’s answers based on how many times you ask or when you ask. One time it will share an age and location and identify your location even when you don’t let Snapchat have it and the other time it says “I’m an AI and a virtual friend and don’t have this information. I have seen many videos where the AI offers to meet up in a location near you and gives you a description and such. It also tends to ask you things that are personal. Ultimately it is very unsafe for teens with the app and is very concerning to parents. It would be okay if it was just a feature but the fact that you can’t unpin it or get rid of it unless you pay is very very concerning. I’m disappointed because this was one of my main forms of communication but will be going away.

title: Snapchat is heading in a bad direction.
text: I’ve been using Snapchat so I can talk to and share moments in my life with my closest friends and family and recently a “Public Profile” story option showed up. It can’t truly be deleted or disabled. In the settings I can delete it, but it still shows up as an option to post my snaps to which I don’t like. I understand mindfulness is key, but I’m also human and I don’t like the possibility that I could accidentally fat-finger post a picture or video of myself or my kids to the Public Profile story option when I mean to post to My Story. This morning an AI chat popped up and it’s not only an eyesore but is also being forced as it cannot be deleted either. I really hate the fact that they’re trying to force people into putting their life on display for the sake of gaining followers and popularity, and I can only imagine the negative impact normalizing AI chats will have on people’s social skills.

title: It needs more clothing
text: Great app! It’s super good for socializing and communicating with your friends or irl friends if needed. Although there’s not that much clothing choices, in styles other then the well known ones. Im more of an alternate person, and I prefer to use leg warmers, arm warmers, long arm gloves, and other types of stuff! I also recommend maybe using layering options, like the “tuck-in” one. Maybe you can have a choice to put a sweatshirt under a T-Shirt, to make it more clear what it’s supposed to be. bracelets, and chokers/necklaces would be a great add as well! Maybe for another idea, sponsor Hottopic for things like that! Overall, I think this is a super good app. I love playing the mini games with my friends and it’s fun to use, but I think you should have more clothing choices.

title: Permanently locked account with no warning.
text: Got my account permanently locked and I’ve had snap for over 5 years, haven’t posted or done anything different than what I have since I got this app. Lost all my contacts, memories, everything to do with it and i’ll never be able to get it back. old pictures of me, my family, dead pets. Absolutely no warning at all and just lost everything. How can you just do that to someone with no warning or any type of heads up. Should not just be an automatic account deletion. Peoples lives are on here and deleting their entire account with no warning is unfair and ridiculous, not to mention you can’t get ahold of anyone that works with snapchat to help, you’ll just end up talking to bots or never hear back from them. Pathetic that this is what a multi million dollar or even billion dollar business does/ treats users.

title: Love it until now.
text: I love this app but what so ever the app today has been acting up, every time i try to look at my friends stories it kicks me out and i've tried shutting my phone off completely and have updated the Snap chat app. idk how to fix this and i'm so beyond mad because i wanna see what going on in their stories but i can't seem to fix the problem so ima leave my snap alone for a bit and see if it will work in a couple of hours? hopefully it starts to work again. it made mad but i think it's doing me good by not being on snapchat all day lol. and just let's get started on the other problems. i want where you can unlink ur bitmoji and still have those bitmoji stickers and where they let us pick the unlinked bitmoji color, maybe i'm just complaining but i want more stuff added lol.

title: Used to be so good
text: App is plagued with so many ads now, the 3D bitmojis look so ugly, AI “feature” which you can’t unpin from the top of your list (unless you pay!) and sometimes they’ll have a banner at the top of the list that loads a second after you get to the chat screen so that if you try to snap your last snapped person it makes you tap the AI instead. There are a million different “snap recap” things when I only want to see the “on this day” ones. This used to be *The* app to talk to your friends on and keep streaks but it just fell off so hard, I’m about to stop using the app due to the bitmojis being so ugly that every time I open the app I just close it again so I don’t have to look at them, and I imagine that even if they do add the 2D bitmojis back you’ll probably have to pay for them just like you have to pay to unpin AI. What started as a great idea for a social media app is now very clearly just a moneygrab.

title: snapchat has gone downhill
text: (before i start excuse my grammar) i’ve had snapchat for yearsss and honestly i HATE the new bitmojis. I know this isn’t just me as so many people have written reviews and even posted about how bad it is. The first time they changed from 2d to 3d it wasn’t that bad because they still had 2d selfies and 2d stickers, but ever since they made the new 3d ones i HATE using this app. not to mention it’s so boring without snapchat games because there’s nothing to do on there. snapchat used to be an amazing app to be social on, now it’s just boring and the bitmojis are ugly. With the new 3d updates bitmojis have started looking less and less like actual people, they’re so inaccurate to what a person actually looks like. if i didn’t have such high snapchat streaks i would delete the app because i just cannot STAND the bitmojis. not to mention they’re the ugliest things ive ever seen… BRING BACK 2D OR BRING BACK THE FIRST 3D MODELS !!!!!!!!!

title: Getting progressively worse
text:
This app used to be a relatively mild social media app that was useful for communication. It is getting progressively more dangerous and allowing people to say whatever they want online. The snap comment section on shorts are amount the most hateful and brutal of any social media app, because there is NO accountability. People can’t open your profile to see who you are, so people say whatever they want. The shorts have absolutely got to go. Not every app needs to be like TikTok. I wish there was an option to block everything on this app except for the actual camera and snapping people. I especially think parents should be able to turn off shorts and the explore page for their kids. There are so many horrible and harmful things on there.

Snap, GET RID of the explore page and shorts. Or at least make it an option to block it.

title: Error message when login into my iPhone
text: Y’all, I swear I have tried to connect to y’all so many times and you were so good at responding and fixing the issue within a timely manner. I have had this error message of “due to too many failed login attempts your Snapchat is temporarily disabled.” I’ve never logged in too many times and failed as I know my account info. I can login on my iPad and any other device though? This is extremely frustrating. I literally haven’t received one non bot response back to me within MONTHS. Clearly my account is fine since it works on any other device. Y’all used to get back to me (non bot) within a minimum of 48 hours…AT MOST! It’s been two months now and it still reads the same error when I try to login from my phone. Y’all please fix this. Please.

title: Annoying app do not use
text: I had used snapchat for the last year no issues at all traveling between the USA and Europe no problems whatsoever. It was nice to plane able to show friends back home where I was what I was doing and how it was going. When I was finally done with my Europe trip heading back to USA everything was fine altho when traveling to Cuba immediately the app would kick me out eventually banning my device. I did not get ang emails I did not get anything other then a message saying I couldn’t log on due to suspicious activity. No one had gotten back to me in any emails or cares too. The fact that I had done nothing wrong is upsetting. I was never told how long my phone would be banned, I never received any emails or notifications about the matter. I am very disappointed. This happened in march and it is now may and still nothing. I would change my review on Snapchat if i was allowed back onto the app.

title: I hate the AI
text: I’m tired of my AI I’ve seen a bunch of videos about how creepy it is. I had my location off and asked the AI where I live. Yet It replied with my address. My location was off the whole time and I asked where did you live? she said in my house and I said where is your house and she said I don’t have a house I live in Snapchat, why is the AI lying to us now she already said she had a house but now she saying she live in Snapchat what is happening Snapchat I need to know you need to delete AI or you’re going to be a one star app never gonna get any of your views back, and people are already starting to delete it Plus you have to pay to get block your AI why that is so messed up it’s like  there’s something that is happening with the AI that they don’t want to tell us one more fact people are getting banned for no reason and if you delete the app once you can never get it back so that is how I know you guys are messed up
